title: Cosmos mall
review: It has many store like big Bazar,relience trends,tata motors Pvt Ltd,Mc donalds and many more is very good

title: Only 5 shops
review: Only a few shops, still under construction. The big bazard is one of the smallest we've seen so far in India. Not really worth it if you have to pay for a cab to go there.

title: Only a handful of shops
review: Ended up here at the wrong time during the day of Eid. The place was a complete mayhem with so many ill mannered young boys enjoying the holidays. Lifestyle and Reliance Trends were good though. Not yet fully occupied and as of now not worth visiting, also located far away from the major attractions in Agra.

title: Poor mall
review: Disappointing mall.  Opening hours were supposed to be at 10 am according to the website but it opened at 12.  Only a few stores, mostly empty on the 2-3rd floors.
